titleStmt.title: Here begynneth a treatyse of this galaunt with the maryage of the bosse of Byllyngesgate. vnto London stone.
Treatyse of a galaunt.
titleStmt.author: Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: J. Skot for Wynkyn de Worde,

notesStmt.note: Another edition of STC 24240, published ca. 1510 with title: Here begynneth a treatyse of a galaunt.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
